metadata.name: Klondike Solitaire Pro
metadata.author: Card Game Engine
metadata.description: Classic Solitaire with advanced mobile controls including pinch-to-zoom and two-finger pan.

instructions.overview: Sort the deck into foundations by suit from Ace to King. Use two fingers to zoom or pan the board.
gameplay: Mobile Controls: Pinch with two fingers to zoom. Drag with two fingers to move the board.
Waste: Tap the empty stock to recycle the waste pile.
instructions.winning: Move all cards to the four Foundation piles.
